backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing contact-form tickets keyed by email with functions to submit, update status, query completion, and modify categories.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a requirement to place a specific logo image into the frontend static assets path.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend files explaining their roles in the React app and styling system.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions establishing OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component composing the header, hero, service tiers, contact form, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: Contact form component handling validation, submission to the backend, and success messaging.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, CTAs, and smooth-scroll handlers to contact and services sections.
frontend/src/components/ServiceTiersSect: Displays three pricing tiers with details and a CTA button that scrolls to the contact form.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with brand info, quick-scroll navigation buttons, and social media icon links.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with scroll detection, desktop/mobile navigation, and smooth section scrolling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity; invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation to submit the contact form through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables using OKLCH colors, plus utilities for typography and logo display.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the current issue and required logo asset placement for correct display.
